summary.para: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves a value indicating if the specified rate control mode is supported for video encoding with the specified codec.
In multi-adapter operation, this indicates which physical adapter of the device this operation applies to.
A member of the enumeration specifying the codec for which rate control mode support is being queried.
A member of the enumeration specifying the rate control mode for which support is being queried.
Receives a boolean value indicating if the specified rate control mode is supported for the specified codec.
